nodes.text: Frostclaw was a male Skel living on Hoth during the Galactic War. A violent leader, Frostclaw led attacks on Ortolan settlers. The Ortolans requested assistance from the Republic. A strike team was dispatched to eliminate the problem. Frostclaw was confronted in his lair. Despite the Skel's strength, he was killed in battle.
Frostclaw serves as the boss for the Republic Heroic Mission: Frostclaw in Star Wars: The Old Republic on Hoth. This article assumes 100% game completion, so he was killed.
